text: Cynthia Lynn (born Zinta Valda Zimilis; April 2, 1937 - March 10, 2014) was a Latvian-American actress. She was best known for her role as Fraulein Helga in Hogan's Heroes during the first season (1965-66). She was born in Riga, Latvian SSR, Soviet Union. Lynn died from multiple organ failure as a result of hepatitis on March 10, 2014. She was 76. She was outlived by her daughter, Lisa Brando, whose father was Marlon Brando. ==References== ==Other websites== * * Cynthia Lynn at AllMovie Category:1937 births Category:2014 deaths Category:American television actors Category:Disease-related deaths in the United States Category:Deaths from hepatitis Category:Deaths from multiple organ failure Category:Actors from Riga Category:Latvian television actors Category:American movie actors Category:American stage actors Category:Latvian stage actors Category:Latvian movie actors
title: Cynthia Lynn
